For readings, see the “References” page for abbreviations used above. For assignments, see the “Assignments” page for descriptions of each assignments (or click on the links in the calendar), and use the “Assignment Submission” form to submit assignments (except for assignments A and B).

Readings and assignments are due by 9am on the class day following the day indicated on the calendar. For example, a reading or assignment listed under Thursday is due by 9am on Friday, and a reading or assignment that’s listed under Friday is due by 9am on Monday.
